info.title: Clint API
info.description: API for managing contacts, deals, and tags in the Clint application

tags.name: Lost Status
tags.description: Operations related to managing lost status

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of contacts

parameters.description: Number of rows skipped of the result
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Select the page of the result
parameters.name: page

parameters.description: Filter by contact tag IDs using OR operator. Separated by ','
parameters.name: tag_ids

parameters.description: Filter by contact tag names using OR operator. Separated by ','
parameters.name: tag_names

parameters.description: Filter by contact fields. Can be used multiple times for each field
parameters.name: fields

totalCount.description: Total items based on current filters

totalPages.description: Total pages based on current filters

get.description: Retrieve a single contact by ID

delete.description: Remove a single contact by ID

post.description: Add tags to a single contact

delete.description: Remove a tag from a contact

requestBody.description: Tag identifier - provide either tag id or tag name

tag_id.description: The ID of the tag to be removed

tag_name.description: The name of the tag to be removed

error.example: You must provide either a tag id or a tag name
